LanguageData.HAR_NM_Sh_K.label: Cloak (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Sh_K.description: A stab-proof, bulletproof garment for the fragile Nearmare。It's strong, but the wearer's fragility prevents them from trusting it too much.

LanguageData.HAR_NM_Sh_BKo.label: Barrier Coat (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Sh_BKo.description: Using the Nearmare's own energy, this coat generates a defensive barrier. However, it is easily damaged and provides no defense against heat or cold.
